productCards.onpremise.description.message: Lightweight private cloud with KVM virtualization, GPU passthrough, and VMware integration

productCards.cmp.description.message: Unified management of multiple public and private cloud platforms, simplifying multi-cloud complexity

productCards.baremetal.description.message: Full lifecycle management of physical machines with OS installation and RAID configuration

productCards.subtitle.message: Choose your deployment method and start using Cloudpods

productCards.onpremise.step1.description.message: One-click deployment of private cloud environment

productCards.onpremise.step2.description.message: Create VM using Web UI or CLI

productCards.onpremise.step3.description.message: Monitor, scale and optimize your private cloud

productCards.cmp.step1.description.message: Add Alibaba Cloud, AWS, Tencent Cloud, etc.

productCards.cmp.step2.description.message: View all cloud resources in a unified interface

productCards.cmp.step3.description.message: Cross-cloud platform batch management of resources

productCards.baremetal.step1.description.message: Automatically discover physical machines and add them to management

productSelector.consultDesc.message: If you have other requirements or are unsure which product to choose, please contact our technical support team for assistance.

homepage.subtitle.message: A cloud-native open-source unified cloud platform

homepage.tagline.message: Build your own cloud on clouds

homepage.buildown.message: Build your own cloud on clouds

homepage.cloudpodsCmpDesc.message: Unified management of public and private clouds

homepage.osSupport.message: System support: CentOS 7.6~7.9 Minimal, Debian 10/11, Ubuntu 22.04, Galaxy Kirin V10 SP2/SP3, Uni President UOS Kongzi

homepage.featureDesc.message: Cloudpods can not only manage local virtual and physical machine resources, but also manage multiple cloud platforms and cloud accounts. Cloudpods hides the differences in data models and APIs of these heterogeneous infrastructure resources, exposing a unified set of APIs to the outside world, allowing users to access multiple clouds as if they were using a single cloud. This greatly reduces the complexity of accessing multiple clouds and improves the efficiency of managing multiple clouds.

homepage.featureServerDesc.message: Runs in Kubernetes, manages and maintains using Kubernetes Operator

homepage.featurePrivateCloudDesc.message: A lightweight private cloud capable of managing massive KVM virtual machines

homepage.featureBaremetalDesc.message: A bare metal cloud capable of managing the entire lifecycle of physical machines

homepage.featureMultipleCloudsDesc.message: The function of managing multi cloud resources can manage most mainstream clouds, including private and public clouds

homepage.featureK8sDesc.message: Deploying and managing Kubernetes clusters in a multi cloud environment

homepage.featureIamDesc.message: A complete multi tenant authentication and access control system

homepage.featureSsoDesc.message: Multi cloud SSO allows access to native consoles of various cloud platforms with a unified federated identity

homepage.featureClimcDesc.message: Efficient management of Cloudpods using command-line tool climc

homepage.featureApiDesc.message: A set of rich and consistent REST APIs and models to access the above cloud resources and functions

homepage.cloudpodsUserDesc.message: Please view the Cloudpods user list on this {issueLink}

homepage.orgDesc.message: Thank you to the following organizations for their contributions to the development of Cloudpods

homepage.createIssue.message: Please submit an issue on GitHub

homepage.createPr.message: Please submit a Pull Request on GitHub

OcbootRun.runChinaAliRegComment.message: # Directly deploy and pull the container image from registry.cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com

# If there is a problem with slow pip installation package download,

OcbootRun.otherRegionHint.message: For some network environments, if registry.cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com is slow or unreachable, you can specify the image source: docker.io/yunion to install, with the following command:

ocbootConfigHA.primaryMasterNodeComment.message: primary_master_node is the node that runs k8s and Cloudpods services

ocbootConfigHA.generateConfigYAML.message: Generate the yaml deployment configuration file

节点服务监听的地址，多网卡时可以指定对应网卡的地址.message: The address that the node service listens to, you can specify the address of the corresponding NIC when you have multiple NICs

对应 Kubernetes calico 插件默认网卡选择规则.message: Default NIC Selection Rules for the Kubernetes calico Plugin

克隆ocboot 的 master 分支. 注意：k3s的部署方式，目前只实现在.message: Clone the master branch of ocboot. Note: Currently, the deployment method of k3s is only implemented in the master branch of ocboot.

默认部署 v3.11.x 版本的云管系统。如需部署其他版本，请自行修改 VERS.message: The default version cloud management is v3.11.x. If you need to deploy a different version, please modify the VERSION file.

获取本机 IP.message: Get the ip address of current server

如果网络情况复杂(多网卡、多ip)，此处也可手工指定 IP.message: In the event of complex network scenarios (multiple network cards, multiple IPs), you can also manually specify the IP address.

可以使用 -h 选项来查看详细参数.message: You may use -h option to display help and usage information.

ocbootConfigHA.controlPlaneHostHint.message: IP of the K8s control node, corresponding to the VIP on which keepalived listens

ocbootConfigHA.controlPlanePortHint.message: K8s control node apiserver listening port

ocbootConfigHA.asHost.message: This node acts as a Cloudpods private cloud compute node, if you don't want the control node to act as a compute node, you can set it to false

ocbootConfigHA.asHostOnVM.message: VM can be used as Cloudpods built-in private cloud compute nodes (default is false). When turning this on, make sure as_host: true

ocbootConfigHA.productVersion.message: Product version, select one from [Edge, CMP, FullStack]. FullStack will install Converged Cloud, CMP will install Multi-Cloud Management Edition, Edge will install Private Cloud

ocbootConfigHA.imageRepository.message: If the machine to be deployed is not in mainland China, you can use dockerhub's mirror repository: docker.io/yunion

ocbootConfigHA.hostNetwork.message: NIC corresponding to default bridge br0 on compute node

ocbootConfigHA.enableMinio.message: Using minio as the VM image backend store

ocbootConfigHA.joinControlNodeVIP.message: The K8s vip of the control node to join

ocbootConfigHA.joinControlNodePort.message: The K8s apiserver port of the control node to join

ocbootConfigHA.asController.message: As a K8s and Cloudpods control node
